an5.61:1.1: “Mendicants, these five perceptions, when developed and cultivated, are very fruitful and beneficial. They culminate in freedom from death and end in freedom from death.
an5.61:1.3: The perceptions of ugliness, death, drawbacks, repulsiveness of food, and dissatisfaction with the whole world.
an5.61:1.4: These five perceptions, when developed and cultivated, are very fruitful and beneficial. They culminate in freedom from death and end in freedom from death.”
